title: Electoral Process (Local Government By-Elections) (Election Date and Time of Poll) Order, 2022
content:
14th March, 2022 Statutory Instruments 73
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO. 21 OF 2022
The Electoral Process Act, 2016
(Act No. 35 of 2016)
The Electoral Process (Local Government
By-Elections) (Election Date and Time of Poll)
Order, 2022
IN EXERCISE of the powers contained in section 125 of the
Electoral Process Act, 2016, the following Order is made:
1. This Order may be cited as the Electoral Process (Local Title
Government By-Elections) (Election Date and Time of Poll)
Order, 2022.
2. A candidate for election as a Mayor or Councillor or in a Date and
district and ward set out in the Schedule shall lodge a nomination time of
nomination
with the Returning Officer on Tuesday, 22nd March, 2022, between for election
0900 hours and 1500 hours.
3. The campaign period shall commence on Tuesday, 22nd Campaign
period
March, 2022, at 1500 hours and close at 1800 hours on Wednesday,
13th April, 2022.
4. (1) The poll for the election of a Mayor or Councillor in a Election date
and time of
district and ward set out in the Schedule shall take place on
poll
Thursday, 14th April, 2022, between 0600 hours and 1800 hours.
(2) A poll shall not be taken in a district and ward if only one
candidate is validly nominated.
5. The Electoral process (Local Government By-Elections)
(Election Date and Time of Poll) Order, 2022, is revoked.
Copies of this Statutory Instrument can be obtained from the Government Printer,
P.O. Box 30136, 10101 Lusaka. Price K 4.00 each.
